programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl disappears, the squad discovers a suspect who seems to be targeting young, vulnerable women with a similar personal connection; Dr. Huang delves into his past in order to help solve the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Voight and members of the Chicago PD travel to New York to help SVU pursue Yates, their prime suspect in a rape/murder case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Rollins hopes to elicit a confession from serial killer Gregory Yates (Dallas Roberts) when a body washes up on the beach where he buried victims, but the information he provides sends shock waves through the police department.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives continue to investigate a woman's murder and dismemberment by following a lead provided by serial killer Gregory Yates.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young woman accuses a celebrity plastic surgeon and his girlfriend of sexual assault, Benson and the team must determine if the woman was attacked or if it was a night of sex games gone wrong.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU helps a man come to terms with being victimized; Benson tries to support a victim's family when tragedy strikes twice.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An 18-year-old girl (Kelly Hutchinson) brings molestation charges against her father (Brian Kerwin) after therapy uncovers repressed memories of abuse, despite his claims that the allegations are false.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives launch a search for a serial killer who raped and murdered two women in Central Park. Michael Gross guest stars.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler hunt for the fiend who raped and impregnated a comatose patient; the trail leads them to a doctor (Bruce Davison) whose stem cell research is funded by a billionaire with Parkinson's disease.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A murdered 14-year-old girl leads the detectives to a prominent physician who specializes in reproduction therapy.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek's father, Bob, goes missing, and the team races to find him before it's too late.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A wellness check on a family reveals signs of foul play, and Detective Upton is determined to find the parents and young daughter; as she delves further into the troubled family dynamics, she reflects on her own childhood trauma.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team pursues a crafty serial rapist; Sgt. Voight finds himself resisting some old, familiar tendencies in his quest for justice.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: After a series of brutal home-invasion robberies, Upton immerses herself in the case and finds herself caught between Voight and Halstead.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight and the team pursue a ruthless crime ring whose business has hit close to home; as they dig deeper, the extent of the danger becomes more apparent; Deputy Superintendent Samantha Miller second-guesses her decisions.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight and the team muster all their expertise to bring down a deadly crime ring; Burgess finds herself in a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Burgess fights for her life as the team scrambles to find her kidnapper; Dep. Supt. Sam Miller is desperate to find her son's killer; Voight and Upton deal with the aftermath of their decision; Ruzek struggles with the pressure of the situation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of false alarms at a private school hinders 51's ability to respond to legitimate emergencies; Kidd asks for ideas to surprise Severide on his birthday; Cruz and Brett rent out their extra room but get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The surprising arrival of a new fire truck brings both joy and chaos to members of Firehouse 51; Boden and Severide are asked to make peace with an old foe for the greater good; Brett receives family news while Foster plans a party with friends.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of mysterious gas leaks has members of Firehouse 51 puzzled and spread thin; Brett's conflicted when her birth mother gets serious about finding her; Severide misunderstands his role as Cruz's best man; Mouch bites off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of teen opioid overdoses sees Severide partner with Sean Roman, but he begins to suspect there's more to the story than his old friend is telling him; Casey tries to be there for Brett as she considers her birth mother's offer to meet.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Boden is on edge after starting a new fad diet; Casey and Severide disagree on a call; Brett's birth mother shares life-altering news; a familiar face has a proposition for Herrmann.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Things get personal for Casey and Gallo in the aftermath of a suburban house fire involving a mother and her young son; Herrmann campaigns for more respect; Kidd has an idea for giving back to her community.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide teams up with Seager and the OFI when a motel structure fire turns suspicious; Firehouse 51 members become amateur sleuths following a Reddit post involving one of their own; Brett continues to get invested in her birth mother, Julie.

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: A football head coach (Al Pacino) and an aging quarterback (Dennis Quaid) clash with the new, contemporary, money-oriented owner (Cameron Diaz) of their team.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: As Firehouse 51 welcomes a new member to the team, whose presence could provide some complications, Brett's leadership shines during a scary call; Boden sees great potential in Kidd and proposes an idea that could have lasting repercussions.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Brett and Mackey find their lives in peril; Casey and Brett tread in unfamiliar territory; Severide chases a memory while Kidd adeptly solves a firehouse problem; Ritter puts himself in harm's way during a harrowing call.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators piece together evidence found at the scene of a Native American woman's murder; the tyre tracks and shoe impressions could lead them to the killer.

programme.desc: A dead newborn leads detectives to a dermatologist, then a serial pedophile.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claiming to have been the victim of rape commits suicide while she is still in the emergency room.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 5-year-old boy is found dead, suspicion falls on his unstable 13-year-old neighbor, whose mental problems began after he was abused at a camp recommended by the dead child's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The dismembered body of a woman is found in a junkyard, and detectives must determine who killed her and who attempted to harvest organs from her corpse.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler's former partner (Sharon Stone) is put on the case when two young sisters are killed in a fire.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Capt. Cragen begins a movement to catch a man who has raped three girls; after a rookie cop makes an arrest in the case, it is discovered the so-called rookie has some secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An 8-year-old boy is kidnapped; members of the SVU team are in a dangerous standoff; shocking details about ADA Jo Marlowe's (Sharon Stone) past come to light.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman with a seemingly squeaky-clean image is found dead in a fountain; further investigation reveals a surprising motive and multiple suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson seek a connection between two men who are beaten and branded with a wire hanger in seemingly separate incidents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl at Detective Stabler's daughter's school accuses another student of rape; ADA Paxton (Christine Lahti) returns to prosecute.

programme.desc: The first round of the U.S. Women's Open is underway at Erin Hills Golf Course in Erin, Wis.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler's investigation into a sexual abuse case goes awry when their wealthy suspect involves his lawyer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Stabler and Tutuola search for a victim and her attacker after video of a sexual assault is featured on a college campus Intranet feed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler work with a sex therapist, Capt. Jackson (Jeremy Irons), when a young girl is murdered.
